casebody.data:
Theodis BROWN, Sr., Appellant, v. RICO Defendants; Unnamed Defendants, Appellees. No. 09-1509. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: June 18, 2009. Filed: June 23, 2009. Theodis Brown, Sr., St. Louis, MO, pro se.

Before RILEY, SMITH, and BENTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Theodis Brown, Sr. (Brown), appeals after the district court1 dismissed his dis*680crimination complaint under 28 U.S.C. § 1915(e)(2)(B). Having carefully reviewed the record, we find no basis for reversal. See Moore v. Sims, 200 F.3d 1170, 1171 (8th Cir.2000) (per curiam) (explaining an appellate court reviews de novo a district court’s § 1915(e)(2)(B) dismissal). Accordingly, we affirm. See 8th Cir. R. 47B. We also deny all of Brown’s pending motions.

. The Honorable Jean C. Hamilton, United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Missouri.
